arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:20}|%|]{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} Enemies that attack you are Poisoned for {c_number}{dot:POISON_DOT}{/c} damage over {c_number}[{buffduration:POISON_DOT}]{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Active:{/c} Your toxins overflow, applying the Poisoning in a trail and making you {c_important}{u}Unhindered{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{buffduration:ACTIVE_PERIODIC}|1|]{/c} seconds.

While active, {c_important}Toxic Skin's{/c} Poisoning is increased by {c_number}[({SF_12}-1)*100|%|]{/c} to {c_number}{dot:POISON_DOT_BUFFED}{/c} over {c_number}[{buffduration:POISON_DOT_BUFFED}]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Toxic Skin{/c} passively increases Thorns damage you deal to Poisoned enemies by {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%x|]{/c}.

While {c_important}Toxic Skin{/c} is active, you deal an additional {c_number}{payload:POISON_CRIT}{/c} Poison damage as Critical Strikes to Nearby {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} Poisoned enemies every second.
